homeView.text_2:
Interactive climbs are now possible for the first time in the history of alpinism. Experience the most famous routes of the world in a 360° view.
Please use a smart phone or a tablet of the latest generation or an up-to-date browser for a perfect 360° experience.

eiger.headline: Eiger
eiger.copy: Experience the ascent of the legendary Eiger North Face as if you would be there as well.

matterhorn.headline: Matterhorn
matterhorn.copy: Follow team360 on the famous Hörnligrat route all the way to the summit.

items.headline: VIRTUAL HEIGHTS
items.copy: Discover a new dimension of virtual mountaineering. Only in Mammut Stores, you can now experience all #project360 routes in breathtaking 3D quality - with the Zeiss VR One.

items.headline2: ARE YOU READY FOR THE ULTIMATE VR EXPERIENCE?
items.copy:
- The Zeiss VR ONE is a premium virtual reality headset with an innovative design and Zeiss precision optics.

- Available in every Mammut Store and ready for you to try.

- Experience the mountain more intensely than ever before and discover the most fascinating routes of the world in a gripping 360° perspective.
What are you waiting for? Experience #project360 live and in action - now in your Mammut Store.

items.headline:
REDISCOVER
THE MOUNTAIN
#PROJECT360
items.copy: Experienced alpinists who don't shy away from extreme challenges. An innovative 360° camera equipment. The result: An interactive mountain experience unlike any other.

items.headline:
THE 360°
TECHNOLOGY
items.copy:
Our challenge: To develop an innovative camera system which can take perfect 360° pictures and videos in the most extreme conditions without unduly hindering the mountain climbers.


Camera technology:

6 outdoor cameras | 1

360° camera rig | 2

3 USB batteries | 3

1 GPS Unit | 4

1 telescopic camera arm | 5

Endurance test: 24h bei -15°C


Backpack:

Optimized weight distribution | 1

Additional stabilization | 2

Additional zipper openings | 3

Function test: Indoor climbing wall

Total weight: 3,5kg

newsletterView.copy: Stay informed about new routes, and other interesting Mammut topics. Please fill out the required field.
newsletterView.popupMsg: Stay informed for new routes and register to our newsletter.

helpView.desktop_item1_p: Navigate with the arrow keys to view the 360˚ panorama or to look up or down.
helpView.desktop_item2_p: Click on the arrow symbols above or below on the page to climb up or down the face.
helpView.desktop_item3_p: Click on the hot spots to get information about the key spots of the tour.
helpView.mobile_1: Touch arrows to climb up or down.
helpView.mobile_2: Drag left or right to experience the 360˚ view.
helpView.mobile_3: Or touch here and move your smartphone or tablet around.
helpView.mobile_5: Find out more about the key spots of the route.

warnViewRotate.headline:
Please rotate
your device
warnViewRotate.copy: For a better 360 experience, rotate your device to landscape mode.

home.title: #PROJECT360: START YOUR TOUR
home.description: Interactive climbs are now possible for the first time in the history of alpinism. Experience the most famous routes of the world in a 360° view.

route/heckmair-route.title: #PROJECT360: EIGER NORTH FACE HECKMAIR ROUTE
route/heckmair-route.description: The Heckmair route of the Eiger North Face is legendary. Now you can experience it interactively and in a 360˚ view for the first time.

team.title: #PROJECT360: THE TEAM360
team.description: The Mammut Pro team athletes Dani Arnold and Stephan Siegrist are our TEAM360 for the first interactive ascent of the Eiger North Face in 360˚ view.

project.title: #PROJECT360: ALL ABOUT THE PROJECT
project.description: For the first interactive ascent of the Eiger North Face in a 360˚ view, the Mammut Pro athletes Dani Arnold and Stephen Siegrist were equipped with an innovative camera.

translation.page404_copy: Looks like you’ve deviated from the route.
